text: Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Zai wo suo feng dao de qishi zhong, wo meiyou faxian shiyong zhe xiang chi er buneng chi de renhe dongxi, chufei shi zi si wu, huo liuchu de xieye, huo zhurou, yinwei zhurou que shi bu jie de, huo nian fei an la zhi ming er zai de fanzui wu.” Dan ruoshi pobudeyi er bingfei xiang weikang, qie wei chaoyue fadu zhe,[name, chi zhexie jinwu shi meiyou zuiguo de]. Ni de zhu que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
